doc.field: Includes a photo of HRL speaking before the Magazine Publishers Association; HRL at the 50 Million Fund for the Presbyterian Church meeting; HRL with Charles S. Rhyne and Richard Nixon at the World Conference on World Peace Through Law; HRL with Alfred Eisenstaedt; closeups of HRL at the Pacem in Terris Conference; group shot with HRL following the honorary degree award from Williams College; HRL with Chancellor Ludwig Erhard; HRL talking with students at Yale; HRL with Gov. Nelson Rockefeller and James Rorimer at the Exhibit of Chinese Art Treasures at the Metropolitan Museum of Art and other photos from a benefit tea event for the exhibit; HRL with Dr. Edler G. Hawkins at the annual Churchmen's Dinner in Honor of Presbyterian Men in Government and photos with other attendees; HRL at the 87th annual Yale Daily News banquet; HRL at Dr. Chandran's? inaugural lecture at the Union Theological Seminary; various HRL portraits; HRL on the phone at his vacation home in Phoenix, AZ; Clare Boothe Luce with Margaret Bourke-White in front of a large globe; group shots with HRL, Clare Boothe, Bourke-White and others; and HRL with Goodwin Knight, Richard Nixon, and Richard Casey at the IIDC Conference.
